sentences.en: Predation is even trickier to uncover when goods are sold together.
sentences.cn: 当商品一起销售时,掠夺行为将会更难发现.

sentences.en: The early singing may also put the males at greater risk of predation.
sentences.cn: 提早唱歌这种行为也增加了雄鸟被捕食的可能.

sentences.en: The fastest land animal in the world, cheetahs once thrived in Africa and Asia, but lion predation haunts their young, and farms and ranching have reduced their habitat.
sentences.cn: 猎豹是陆地上速度最快的动物，曾在亚非大地上大量生长，但它们的幼兽常为狮子等捕食，栖息场所也因不断增加的农庄和牧场而缩减。

sentences.en: The importance of predation as an exploitation strategy may be summarized under four main categories.
sentences.cn: 捕食作用作为一种掠夺性的对策其重要意义可归纳为四个主要方面.

sentences.en: The predation and spatial heterogeneity on Harmonia axyridis adult to Myzus persicae were determined.
sentences.cn: 测定异色瓢虫成虫对桃蚜的捕食功能和空间异质性.

sentences.en: There are as well as density - dependent biological factors such as disease, predation, and intraspecific conpetition.
sentences.cn: 还有密度制约的生物因素,诸如病害 、 捕食和种内竞争等.

sentences.en: They seem to be missing the know - how that makes it possible to escape predation.
sentences.cn: “但是要想使它们回到海洋后能顺利成活却十分困难.

sentences.en: Three bio - methods for sludge reduction including aerobic digestion, anaerobic digestion and predation by T.
sentences.cn: 通过间歇试验得到3种生物方式(污泥好氧消化 、 厌氧消化以及颤蚓摄食)对污泥的比减量速率、污泥减量速率和污泥减量比例.

sentences.en: We think of these strategies as having been in response to competition and in response to predation.
sentences.cn: 我们认为，它们的这种生存策略是为了应对生存竞争和其他生物的捕食。

words.tran_cn: 掠夺的，掠夺成性的；食肉的；捕食生物的
[动] 捕食者；[动] 食肉动物；掠夺者

trans.tran_en: when an animal kills and eats another animal
